plot(x,d1,'b-^','LineWidth',1.5);
hold on;
plot(x,d2,'g-o','LineWidth',1.5);
hold on;
plot(x,d3,'r-*','LineWidth',1.5);
hold on;
plot(x,d4,'k-*','LineWidth',1.5);
hold on;
plot(x,d5,'y-*','LineWidth',1.5);
hold on;
plot(x,d6,'m-*','LineWidth',1.5);
hold on;
%plot(x,transmission,'c-*','LineWidth',1.5);
hold on;
%plot(x,interest,'c-.','LineWidth',1.5);
hold on;

xlabel('Time Constraint / day');
ylabel('Delivery Ratio');
axis([2,47,0.0,1.0]);
legend('Proximity-Simbet-1','Proximity-Simbet-2','Proximity-Simbet-3','Proximity-Simbet-4','Greedy-Total','Epidemic',1);
